mapper.select: SELECT member.user_id FROM project INNER JOIN contributor ON project.id = contributor.project_id INNER JOIN member ON contributor.member_id = member.id WHERE project.id = #{id}

SELECT p.id, p.name,p.member_id, m.user_id AS member_id, p.create_at, p.step, p.del_chk, GROUP_CONCAT(c.member_id SEPARATOR ',') AS contributors FROM project p LEFT JOIN contributor c ON p.id = c.project_id LEFT JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.id GROUP BY p.id, p.name, p.create_at, p.step

SELECT c.id, c.project_id, m.user_id, c.content, c.status, c.create_at, c.step, c.status, a.id FROM comment c JOIN attachment a ON c.project_id = a.identify_value JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.id WHERE c.project_id = #{id} AND a.classification = '프로젝트첨부파일';
